00069 inline void CInteractiveArrowShape::EnsurePointsAreValid() const
00070 {
00071        if (!m_arePointsValid){
00072               const i2d::CLine2d* linePtr = dynamic_cast<const i2d::CLine2d*>(GetModelPtr());
00073               if (linePtr != NULL){
00074                      CalcPoints(*linePtr);
00075               }
00076               else{
00077                      ResetPoints();
00078               }
00079               m_arePointsValid = true;
00080        }
00081 }
00082 
00083 
00084 inline void CInteractiveArrowShape::EnsurePointsAreValid(const i2d::CLine2d& line) const
00085 {
00086        if (!m_arePointsValid){
00087               CalcPoints(line);
00088               m_arePointsValid = true;
00089        }
00090 }
